name: Ben Mezrich Project - Bitcoin and Billionaires Collection

metadata.description: The Ben Mezrich Project - Bitcoin and Billionaires is part two of a three part set inspired by Ben's initial journey into crypto and Bitcoin. Collectors who own a set of all three tokens will receive the Ben Mezrich Project screenplay token. By owning a Ben Mezrich NFT you have agreed to the Terms and Conditions found here https://www.benmezrichnft.com/terms
